name: [DEMO] Anthill 0.7.0
description:
DOESNT WORK PROPERLY ON PHONES OR OTHER NON 1280x720 COMPATIBLE DEVICES/APPS (BUT SINCE 0.7.0 ITS BETTER!)

Check progress here https://trello.com/b/PLB1GXhr

Changelog 0.7.0:
- Two upgrades: enable queen ant healing and keeping ants from wandering off and dying
- Help knob helps you
- fullscreen compatible
- mildly playable on phones
- press "A" to cheat in some money

Changelog 0.5.0:
- Upgrades
- Highscore - Success rate %
- Various visuals

Changelog 0.3.2:
- The ant queen in the anthill now has health
- The queen can and will die
- Press 'R' to reset the game (also after dying)
